ShaderParamDef

ShaderParamDef defines the shader definitions that were parsed from HLSL by ParseShader. These definitions define the variables that each shader defines (i.e. may be set by the client)

ShaderParamInstance

ShaderParamInstance defines each parameter that a shader exposes. These parameters are derived from the ShaderDefs above. This is servers copy of each parameter along with its value and position in the constant buffer.

CShader
public
IShader
public
CRefCount
CShader

Defines a shader used to render materials on an object

A shader defines a material on a renderable. It is comprised of a pixel shader, a vertex shader, and constants passed to those shaders.

CShaderMgr
public
IShaderMgr
public
CRefCount
CShaderMgr

Defines our shader manager. Each shader is registered with this manager.
